item.title: Using Hugo With Github Pages
item.description: Hey there! I just moved my blog from Jekyll to Hugo and I wanted to give a quick tutorial on how to use Hugo with GitHub pages. Installation First, you’ll need to install Hugo: MacOS: brew install hugo Linux: brew install hugo (Here’s a link on how to install brew for Linux) Windows: choco install hugo -confirm or scoop install hugo Note: You may need to install Go. Hugo on GitHub Pages Installing Hugo for GitHub Pages is pretty simple.
